message:
Hey fellow geeks, we built a content recommendation system that offers personalized recommendations from your content to your visitors, 

it works with Arabic and English content, and learns from the user behaviour to offer better results for returning visitors. 

We're gonna be launching a beta in few days and we were wondering if there are website owners who would be interested in testing it out :) ?? (It's free BTW)
http://adjoin.io/
Arabic version: http://adjoin.io/ar
story: Mohamed Yahya shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Adjoin.io | Personalized Content Recommendations
caption: adjoin.io
description: Adjoin is a content Recommendation platform that offers personalized recommendations.

data.message:
Amazing..Keep it up i guess everyone should try it
Keep developing it Yahya..well done
Nice! Had this idea on my bucketlist for a while now :D
Amr Kamal Thanks alot dude, I appreciate the vote of confidence :) .
Mosab Ahmad Thank you :), I'd love to hear your feedback once it's out (should be few days isA )

Hey Mostafa, the system includes its own spider that crawls content we're interested in and it also connect to all major social networks API like Twitter , FB , YouTube and others. This allows us to monitor trends and figure out viral content. 
To add it to your site, a simple script will be added to ur pages that renders the related content, kinda like how a facebook share integrates with websites.

The model already exists, Mostafa Nageeb.

There are several providers of this : 

1. Outbrains
2. Taboola
3. Revcontent
4. Gravity

But I haven't seen any supporting Arabic.

Gravity has published a blog post a while ago about how they build the interest graphs, it is not really technical, but will give you a hint.

http://www.gravity.com/blog/how-we-build-these-cool-interest-graphs/
Mosab Ahmad Thats a cool article, gives a pretty good overview of the idea.  Thanks for sharing dude :)

Let me be frank, it's awful how such systems can and WILL destroy the variety, and the creativity.
I'd write one unique article a day rather than write 10 via such system.

Mohamed Samir thanks for the feedback :) . The system merely recommends content based on the personal interests of the visitors, it doesn't give predictive analysis (not yet at least) to the content creator. 
we're big fans of diverse content in both Arabic and English and one of our goals is to provide a channel to motivate people to create a high quality arabic content, it's lacking behind compared to English and other Latin based languages :).

Thanks Mohamed Yahya for your patience and understanding.

Anyway, we should encourage and support anyone with intention to contribute enrich the Arabic content, however, my advice to you is to focus the efforts on the Arabic content.

And definitely I will check it later.
